snippet.title: Axiom Verge 2 - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
You may think you already know the world of Axiom Verge. Think again.

Indra alone can navigate the breach. She fights for her life, empowered by the same microscopic machines that are gradually consuming her humanity. Life. Afterlife. Real. Virtual. Dream. Nightmare. It's a thin line. It's Axiom Verge 2.

Learn more: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/axiom-verge-2-switch/

Axiom Verge 2 releases on Nintendo Switch in Fall 2020.

#AxiomVerge2 #NintendoSwitch #IndieWorld
 
Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
